Wash Sale.definition: a sale and purchase of securities that produces no change of the beneficial owner ;specif
Wash Sale.origin: [probably from the comparison of such a sale to the act of washing, which does not affect the nature of the thing washed]

1.1: a sale and purchase of securities that produces no change of the beneficial owner

2.1: a sale of securities within 30 days before or after the purchase of substantially identical securities
2.note: Any loss from such a sale is not deductible for most taxpayers under the Internal Revenue Code.
